Description: Position controller P gain.The default value is calculated.In the case of switching between the two controlloop parameter sets, the values are changedlinearly over the time defined in the parameterCTRL_ParChgTime.In increments of 0.1 1/s.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3012:3hModbus 4614Profibus 4614CIP 118.1.3ModbusTCP 4614EtherCAT 3012:3hPROFINET 4614
